Confidential Investment Offering

Zomes Short Term Rental Portfolio

Explore Properties STR Market
Investment Summary

We Develop and Manage Luxory Short Term Properties in top US Markets

Experiential Destination Property

In an industry as competitive as hospitality, finding a way to stand out from the crowd is imperative. Zomes offer a guest experience that embodies the natural environment in which it is situated. The accommodations go beyond just affording travelers the ability to explore the locality, Zomes makes the property a destination in and of itself.

Appeals to Environmentally Minded Travelers

According to a survey conducted by TripAdvisor in 2021, Americans are increasingly looking for a vacation rental that provides sustainable amenities. Nearly 46% of the surveyed respondents mentioned that they’d prefer to stay in a property that uses less energy and water and 43% of them mentioned they would choose an environmentalfriendly rental if available.

Zomes are made from recyclable, sustainable, and carbon-negative material. They also appeal to a growing section of chemically sensitive travelers, as they are built with contain non-toxic materials, without any glues, paints, or other air pollutants.

STR Development Program

The Zomes portfolio is designed to produce and optimum price/value ratio. Built specifically to rent out short term, Zomes are optimized to appeal to the luxury "unique stay" short term renter. Everything from location, amenities, furnishing, to site orientation is designed to maximize year-round occupancy, and average daily rate in relation to build cost.

Custom Built Unique Vacation Rentals

Shell Dwellings, LLC (“Zomes”) is pleased to present the opportunity to invest in a portfolio of 3 properties with 6 luxury short-term rental ZOME units in the Sedona, AZ market. ZOMES meet the growing demand for Experiential vacation properties and have already been recognized as one of Airbnb’s top 100 “OMG” offerings.

By vertically integrating the manufacturing and development, and partnering with national STR operators, we are streamlining the process and delivering high-end experiential properties faster and more efficiently than competitors.

How it Works

01

Property Hunt

We model demand, demographics, and multiple economic factors to identify properties in hot STR markets.

Once we identify a location, we develop multiple properties there before moving on the next. This gives us cross-marketing, and economy of scale advantages.

02

Deal Analysis

Using platforms like Airdna we analyze ADR, Occupancy, and trends to determine which unit mix and amenities to develop.

We comission 3rd party reports to study local code ordinances, and our typical customers and customize the unit mix to meet their needs.

03

Alligned Interest

We develop and manage the vacation rentals with minimal sponsor, development and construction fees.

We make the same bet we ask our investors to make: That guests will love our zomes and pay top dollar for them.

ZOMES was a recipient of Airbnb’s $10M “OMG” Fund award!

Airbnb Q2 2022 earnings noted that bookings for unique homes were up 80% compared to pre-pandemic levels.

Because demand for unique listings was far exceeding supply, AirBnb offered 100 Recipients from 23 countries have been chosen to bring their ideas to life with $100,000!

The Compound Annual Growth Rate of STR market is projected at 11.1% from 2022 to 2030. Unique destinations are projected to far outperform that.
